title: Ocean Breeze
description: A calming blue theme inspired by ocean waves and sea breeze
css: :root { --complexity-accent: #0ea5e9; --complexity-bg: #0f172a; --complexity-surface: #1e293b; --complexity-text: #f1f5f9; --complexity-text-muted: #94a3b8; } body { background: var(--complexity-bg) !important; color: var(--complexity-text) !important; } .bg-white { background: var(--complexity-surface) !important; } .text-gray-900 { color: var(--complexity-text) !important; } .text-gray-600 { color: var(--complexity-text-muted) !important; } .border-gray-200 { border-color: #0369a1 !important; } .hover\:bg-gray-50:hover { background: var(--complexity-surface) !important; }

config.title: Ocean Breeze
config.customCss: :root { --complexity-accent: #0ea5e9; --complexity-bg: #0f172a; --complexity-surface: #1e293b; --complexity-text: #f1f5f9; --complexity-text-muted: #94a3b8; } body { background: var(--complexity-bg) !important; color: var(--complexity-text) !important; } .bg-white { background: var(--complexity-surface) !important; } .text-gray-900 { color: var(--complexity-text) !important; } .text-gray-600 { color: var(--complexity-text-muted) !important; } .border-gray-200 { border-color: #0369a1 !important; } .hover\:bg-gray-50:hover { background: var(--complexity-surface) !important; }
